trans-unit.source: Defines methods to dynamically create, update and remove code elements for a type at design time.
Methods are also provided that allow you to display code at design time.
Creates an event on the specified class by using the specified event name, event type and attributes.
A string that contains the class name to add the event to.
A string that defines the name of the event.
The <xref:System.Type> assigned to the event.
An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AttributeInfo"></xref> array that contains information on all attributes to assign to the event.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to emit any dependency properties associated with the event; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Creates a field on the specified class by using the specified field name, field type, parameter types, attributes and literal initialization expression.
A string that defines the name of the class to add the field.
A string that defines the name of the field.
The <xref:System.Type> of the new field.
A <xref:System.Type> array of any parameters associated with the field.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes"></xref> that defines the member attribute identifier for the field.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetExpression"></xref> that contains the literal expression of the field.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to delete any existing fields on `className` when creating the new field; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Creates a property on the specified class by using the specified property name, property type and attributes.
A string that defines the name of the class to add the field.
A string that defines the name of the field.
The <xref:System.Type> of the new property.
An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AttributeInfo"></xref> array that contains information on all attributes to assign to the property.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to emit any dependency properties associated with the property; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to create the property as a meta property; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the emitted dependency property has its <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.IsAttached*> property set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The <xref:System.Type> that is declaring the dependency property.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to create the property as a read-only property; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to create the property as a read-write property.
Removes the specified event from the specified class.
A string that contains the name of the class from which to remove the event.
A string that contains the name of the event to remove.
The <xref:System.Type> associated with the event to remove.
Removes the specified property from the specified class.
A string that contains the name of the class from which to remove the property.
A string that contains the name of the property to remove.
The <xref:System.Type> of the property to remove.
Displays code for the new member on a workflow design surface.

Displays code for the new member on a workflow design surface by using the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>, the specified method and the specified delegate type.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> associated with the code to display.
The name of the method to display.
The <xref:System.Type> of the delegate associated with the method to display.
Updates the base type to associate with the specified class.
A string that contains the name of the class to update with a new base type.
The <xref:System.Type> to be the new base type for the class.
Sets a new name and type to an existing event on the specified class.
A string that contains the name of the class that contains the event to update.
A string that contains the name of the existing event.
The <xref:System.Type> associated with the existing event.
A string that contains the new name of the updated event.
The <xref:System.Type> to associate with the updated event.
An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AttributeInfo"></xref> array that contains information on all attributes to assign to the updated event.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to update the event to emit a dependency property; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to set the event as a meta property; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Sets a new name and type to a property on the specified class.
A string that contains the name of the class on which the property to update resides.
A string that contains the existing name of the property.
The <xref:System.Type> associated with the existing property.
A string that contains the new name of the property.
The <xref:System.Type> to associate with the updated version of the property.
An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AttributeInfo"></xref> array that contains information on all attributes to assign to the updated property.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to update the property emit a dependency property; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to set the property as a meta property; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Updates the name of the specified class.
A string that contains the existing name of the class.
A string that contains the new name to assign to the class.
